title: What is that...
body:
I game no showing any champion so i am not able to pickup but after restart its show me  low queue priority. 
https://s14.postimg.org/ltxbdatgt/image.png
https://s14.postimg.org/m7yncwdkd/image.png

replies.body:
Unfortunately, the screenshots are really small so I can't see what' happening.  If you're unable to locate any champions then there coudl other be an issue with game files or your connection that's causing you to lose sync.  To know for sure, return to the legacy client and try champion select again in a custom game:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

If the issue persists, I recommend a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)to rule out any possibilities with the installation of the client.  Let me know what you find.
This is a frequent issue and is usually solved my minimizing the client and maximizing it again, should fix any issues in champ select in regards to champion or rune/mastery selection
